message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 1-2-2, translated into en
data:
- List of ethnic groups in Vietnam promulgated together with Decision No. 121-TCTK/PPCD dated March 2, 1979 by the Director General of the General Statistics Office);

- The list of administrative units of Vietnam 2010 issued together with the Prime Minister's Decision No. 124/2004/QD-TTg dated July 8, 2004 and the changes updated by the General Statistics Office to date. as of December 31, 2019.
